name: Ba-thesis.github.io
tagline: Network Analysis of Mexican Drug-Trafficking Organizations (University of Chicago B.A. Thesis)
body:
Contains a procedure and necessary data sets for analysis of complex social networks,
 specifically Mexican Drug-Trafficking Cartels.
 
Submitted as part of a B.A. Thesis entitled "Mapping the Mexican Cartel: Biomimcry, Big Data, and Complex Network Analysis in the War on Drugs", 
turned into  to the University of Chicago  Public Policy Department in Spring 2014
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
